programme.title: Hava em Chamas, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um supervulco entra em erupo no Hava, uma equipe de especialistas precisa correr contra o tempo para salvar a vida da populao antes que ela seja atingida pela lava fumegante.

programme.title: Algum Muito Especial, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: Nesta histria do lendrio cineasta John Hughes, Keith, Watts e Amanda provam que preciso arriscar ter o corao partido para encontrar o verdadeiro amor. Esta comdia romntica inesquecvel tem risos, romance e fala sobre Algum Muito Especial.

programme.title: Apertem os Cintos... O Piloto Sumiu!, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: Um homem com medo de voar precisa garantir que um avio pouse em segurana depois que os pilotos adoecem.

programme.title: Eu, Voc, Ele e os Outros, (1984, Action)
programme.desc: O dubl Elliot e o saxofonista em estgio probatrio Greg so chamados por uma agncia porque tm uma semelhana perfeita com dois primos bilionrios brasileiros que precisam ser substitudos porque correm perigo de vida.

programme.title: Curso de Vero, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: Comearam as frias e o professor de educao fsica de Ocean Front High, Freddy Shoop, tem grandes planos: passar o vero no Hava. Mas o vice-presidente da escola tem outros planos para Freddy: uma posio como o professor de ingls no curso de frias.

programme.title: Beowulf: O Guerreiro das Sombras, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: Numa terra sob cerco, Beowulf deve combater a horrvel criatura Grendel e a sua me que procura vingana.

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: Obsesso Fatal, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Aps uma tentativa de assalto sua casa, um casal de Los Angeles chama a polcia e conhece o detetive Pete Davis, que parece ser gentil e atencioso. Mas a amizade se transforma numa obsesso doentia,

programme.title: A Fria do Protetor, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Billy Wong, policial de Nova Iorque que usa artes marciais, investiga com seu parceiro o sequestro de Laura, filha de um milionrio suspeito de ligao com um traficante de Hong Kong.

programme.title: Os Dois Super-Tiras em Miami, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Doug Bennet e Steve Forrest permaneceram amigos, mesmo depois que Steve deixou o FBI. Mas, para reuni-los, est Garret, um perigoso ex-presidirio em cujo caso os dois policiais trabalharam juntos.

programme.title: Cowboy do Asfalto, (1980, Drama)
programme.desc: Bud Davis operrio de uma refinaria do Texas. noite, troca seu capacete por um chapu e vai para o Gilleys, o bar mais popular de Houston.

programme.title: Invencveis, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: A histria de quatro garotos amigos que tem a amizade ameaada aps um tiroteio que deixa um deles em coma (T.J.) e outro com um segredo (Brent). As consequncias da escolha de Brent deixam T.J. no hospital, e a alma de Brent em crise.

programme.title: Grandes Olhos, (2015, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Pintora e defensora das causas feministas, a norte-americana Margaret Keane enfrenta um de seus maiores desafios ao levar ao tribunal o prprio marido. Em um perodo em que o reconhecimento de um trabalho feminino era difcil.

programme.title: Liquidao de Natal, (2013, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Basil e o motorista Nick dirigem-se ao corao das Montanhas Rochosas em um clima perigoso. Quando a jornada se torna potencialmente fatal, Basil deve decidir se est preparado para sacrificar sua vida por outra.

programme.title: A rvore Da Vida, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: A histria de uma famlia em Waco, Texas, em 1956. O filho mais velho testemunha a perda da inocncia e luta com os ensinamentos conflitantes de seus pais.

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar, (2020, Romance)
programme.desc: Jamie era a ltima pessoa por quem Landon se apaixonaria. Muito sria e conservadora para seu gosto, filha de um pastor de igreja batista.

programme.title: All She Wrote, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Enquanto tenta recomear em Nova Iorque, um antigo pugilista manipulado para voltar ao ringue para uma ltima luta.

programme.title: Prova de Fogo, (2009, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: No trabalho o Capito Caleb vive pelo velho ditado dos bombeiros: Nunca deixe o seu companheiro para trs. Em casa, ele vive pelas prprias regras. Agora Caleb ter o seu trabalho mais rduo, resgatar o corao de sua esposa.

programme.title: Atormentado pelo passado, (2020, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Um homem luta para chegar a um acordo com a insegurana paralisante e os resduos de seu abuso sexual na infncia nas mos de um padre confivel e respeitado.

programme.title: Nascem dois sis em Tquio, mais uma operao malfica em movimento pelo Imprio Crisis.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Bancos so roubados e uma nica prova do crime intriga a polcia: cascos de bananas. Issamu e Joe Kazumi levam o caso a srio e tentam bolar um plano para atrair algum aficcionado por bananas.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Mais fugitivos do grupo de Resistncia do Imprio Crisis caminham rumo Terra. Desta vem quem aparece diante de Issamu e Joe Clia, antiga namorada de Joe.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX
programme.sub-title: Entre o Amor e a Amizade

programme.title: Passos inquietantes ecoam no deserto da morte. A Shadow Moon, o inimigo mais poderoso e imortal de todos, voltou. Shadow Moon faz um pacto obscuro com o General Jark.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Masao presencia um acidente envolvendo soldados do Imprio Crisis e eles deixam cair um controle remoto em formato de teclado que possui habilidades ocultas. Pessoas comeam a ter a aparncia modificada uma atrs da outra e Issamu estuda o caso.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: O pai de Hakyo continua agindo de forma estranha... O plano de Gadorian para alimentar a Comunidade Camila, transformando-os em comida para monstros, que envolve o Monstro Kaima Lickpack, ativa a ira de Issamu.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Maribaron volta para Crisis e recebe ordens expressas do Imperador Crisis. Bosgan recebe ordens especficas para capturar noivas cujo signo de Escorpio. Bosgan chama o Guerreiro Kaima Gainakamakil e ambos vo ao encontro de Issamu para confront-lo.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Jaspion encontra o filho do professor e cientista Katayama. O menino est chateado por sentir a ausncia do pai, mas na verdade o professor foi sequestrado pela quadrilha de Macgaren para projetar uma fortaleza indestrutvel.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Jaspion e Kanoko sonham com sete raios de luz que atingem cinco crianas, um heri e um beb. Edin vem Terra ajuda-los a interpretar o sonho.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Edin leva a famlia Nanbara para o seu mundo, um porto seguro contra os ataques de Satan Goss. Enquanto isso, Kilza e Macgaren executam seu prximo plano.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: O cozinheiro espacial Bragul e Macgaren se unem para raptar Miya e atrair Jaspion para uma emboscada.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Miki uma menina com poderes sobrenaturais. Resgatada por Macgaren de um desmoronamento ela pressionada a ajud-lo. Macgaren usa o poder de Miki para corromper os cidados da vila.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: A irm da bruxa Kilza, Kilmaza, surge com os ninjas espaciais e pe em prtica seu plano de fazer as pessoas odiarem Jaspion.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Kilmaza implanta diamantes falsos na terra para corromper o corao das pessoas e trazer caos ao pas
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: John Tiger um ex-assassino profissional e amigo de infncia de Jaspion. Abandonou o caminho do crime com muito tempo e cuida de um orfanato, mas Kilmaza surge para enfeiti-lo. Jaspion ter que enfrent-lo em um duelo mortal para quebrar o feitio.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Durante uma viagem espacial, os cientistas do planeta Brain Dr. Pab, Dra. Mam e seu filho Pep so raptados pelo Sindicato da Treva Galctica ao mando de Kilmaza.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: A histria de Pep e Hiroshi

programme.title: Satan Goss comea sua metarmorfose. uma transformao dolorosa que provoca nele acessos de fria incontrolvel. Para acalm-lo, Kilmaza e Macgaren procuram sacrificar uma menina em um ritual maligno.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: O misterioso mundo de Satan Goss

programme.title: Aps a metamorfose Satan Goss exerce seu grande poder alterando a superfcie da Terra e transformando-a numa floresta de monstros gigantes.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: A sede de destruio de Satan Goss no tem tamanho. Macgaren treina com seu pai para derrotar Jaspion. Kilmaza continua executando seus planos malignos. Jaspion precisa encontrar logo na quinta criao.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: Sou o filho de Satan Goss!

programme.title: Comea a ltima batalha onde Jaspion e Edin enfrentam Satan Goss e Kilmaza.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: A unio dos povos da Via Lctea

programme.title: Uma desconhecida ninja do imprio procura Tetsuzan Yamashi e encontrar sua localizao de Pako. Jiraya ento ajuda a nisei a encontrar o local nas minas.

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 41 - Olmpica VS Sat Uchnin Del-Star e Igynin Beni Lagarto(controlado pela magia da Espada Sat) Tha(Jiraiya)

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 43 - O Indomvel Strover Shakunin Strover Tha(Jiraiya)

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Uchnin Dell-Star se une a famlia dos feiticeiros para torturar destruir Jiraya. Ele utiliza de um ninja aposentado para espalhar o boato de que Pako est com os Yamashi e coloca a populao contra eles.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 46 - Amizade Perdida Uchnin Del-Star Tha(Jiraiya) e Henri Rakuchin

programme.title: Manabu conhece uma menina filha do professor Takai que acredita que o Senhor do Mal se esconde na mina e apenas ele pode decifrar a escritura. A famlia de feiticeiros consegue a confiana do professor para encontrar o Deus Jirai e destru-lo
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 47 - Manabu e seu Primeiro Amor Aracnin Morgana e Seinin Allan(enfeitiado por Morgana, e posteriormente salvo por Manabu) Manabu e Akari

programme.title: O planeta Me das Trevas se aproxima da Terra e Uchnin Dell-Star finalmente quer a sua vingana. O centro terremoto na mina em que esconde o Deus Jirai, ento a famlia Yamashi vai at l para saber o que aconteceu e encontra Pako.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 48 - O Aparecimento de Pako Uchnin Del-Star , Kenin Parchis, Suinin Tubaro Mor e Yaminin Devilcat Famlia Yamashi

programme.title: Para exterminar Pako, o planeta das trevas se aproxima da Terra pouco a pouco e, nesse exato momento na mina, inicia-se uma magnfica batalha entre jiraya e seu velho inimigo Dell-Star.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: H uma conspirao em curso no Forte Crisis. Maribaron executa uma misso que consiste sequestrar uma jovem garota para se transformar na Princesa Garonia, tentando enganar desde o Imperador Crisis at mesmo o General Jark e os outros quatro comandantes.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Action)

programme.title: O Caador de Drages, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que o pai de Will morto por um drago, ele embarca em uma jornada pica para se vingar do monstro .

programme.title: Motoqueiro Fantasma: Esprito de Vingana, (2012, Comic Books and Superheroes)
programme.desc: Nove anos aps se transformar no temido Motoqueiro Fantasma, Johnny Blaze se refugia para tentar controlar sua maldio e deix-la escondida da maioria das pessoas. Ele leva uma vida solitria, at ser obrigado a entrar em ao novamente.

programme.desc: A mando de seu pai, o jovem dArtagnan viaja da Gasconha rural para Paris, onde se envolve em uma trama desonesta entre os mosqueteiros do rei e os guardas do cardeal Richelieu.

programme.title: O Retorno do Drago - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Segundo uma lenda milenar chinesa, a cada 60 anos uma forte tempestade de areia revelar o local onde um tesouro sagrado que estava perdido est localizado, a regio de Dragon Gate.

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitria contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exrcito chins. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nao mais uma vez atacada, Qi se v obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chins, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan faz o papel de um fugitivo do Japo que se torna um assassino para a mfia. O longa focado na vida de imigrantes chineses que vivem no Japo.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que est tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do pas est em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.desc: Um homem, que encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele no sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua famlia.

programme.title: Honra, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficaro do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos comearem.

programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Co de briga, (2005, Action)

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Clube da Luta, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.title: His Girl Friday, (1939, Comedy)
programme.desc: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

programme.title: The Miracle Worker, (1962, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Academy Awards went to Best Actress Anne Bancroft and Best Supporting Actress Patty Duke for their moving portrayals of Annie Sullivan and her remarkable blind and deaf pupil, Helen Keller.

programme.title: The Killing, (1956, Heist Films)
programme.desc: With fascinating detail, Stanley Kubrick lays bare the intricate inner-planning of a racetrack heist by a deadly mastermind (Sterling Hayden) and his crew. Co-stars Coleen Gray.

programme.title: Paths Of Glory, (1957, War)
programme.desc: This powerful, fact-based absurdity-of-war film stars Kirk Douglas as a commanding officer who defends three scapegoats on trial for a failed offensive that occurred within the French Army in 1916.

programme.title: Sweet Smell of Success, (1957, Crime)
programme.desc: A columnist and a press agent tear into the maelstrom of midtown Manhattan's night creatures in a sinister game that involves money, power and ultimately survival.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men, (1957, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Eleven jurors are convinced that the defendant is guilty of murder. The twelfth has no doubt of his innocence. How can this one man steer the others toward the same conclusion? Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb lead the all-star cast in this classic!

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (1962, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Sinatra, Laurence Harvey, Janet Leigh, and Angela Lansbury headline an all-star cast in this daring thriller rife with political intrigue, mental manipulation, and a diabolical plot that may lead to the highest levels of the government.

programme.title: West Side Story, (1961, Musical)
programme.desc: Winner of ten Academy Awards including Best Picture, this electrifying musical sets the ageless tragedy of 'Romeo and Juliet' in the slums of 1950s New York and stars Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno, and George Chakiris.

programme.title: The African Queen, (1951, Action)
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: The Honeymooners, (2005, Comedy)

programme.title: Trading Places, (1983, Screwball)

programme.title: Fences, (2016, Drama)

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story about a single father and his young son. Finding themselves homeless, he risks everything on an unpaid internship in a highly competitive stockbroker training program, where only one in twenty interns make the grade.

programme.title: The Tuxedo, (2002, Action)

programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Double Impact, (1991, Action)

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Double Team, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: The Raid: Redemption, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Jakarta's slums lies a drug-gangs safe house, home to some of the most terrifying and ruthless fighters in the city. Arriving before dawn, an elite swat team moves in to take down the notorious drug lord that runs it.

programme.title: The Raid 2 (Subtitled), (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A flamboyant French Formula One driver aims to dethrone NASCAR superstar Ricky Bobby, whose 'win at all costs' approach has made him a national hero. Now Ricky Bobby must face his own demons and fight Girard for the title of racing's top driver.

programme.title: Joe Dirt, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Joe Dirt is a janitor with a mullet, acid-washed jeans, and a dream -- to find the parents he lost at the Grand Canyon when he was a belligerent, trailer park-raised kid. Now, the irrepressibly optimistic Joe hits the road in search of his folks.

programme.title: A League of Their Own, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jimmy Dugan, a washed-up ballplayer whose big league days are over, is hired to coach in the All-American Girls Baseball League of 1943, while the male pros are at war.

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot, (2016, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: Stuck in a rut, reporter Kim Baker decides to shake things up by taking a dangerous assignment in Afghanistan. Far from home and completely out of her comfort zone, Kim discovers her true strength as she risks it all to find the next big story.

programme.title: The Green Hornet, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a slacker by day, party animal by night... until he finds a serious career that's seriously cool: crime-fighting action hero. As the Green Hornet, he teams up with gadget wiz and martial arts master Kato to take down LA's underworld.

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly star as two aimless middle-aged losers who are forced to become roommates after their parents get married.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles, (1987, Screwball)
programme.desc: Neal just wants to fly home to Chicago for Thanksgiving with his family. But all he gets is misery. Misery named Del Griffith a loud mouthed salesman who leads Neal on a wild goose chase.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles, (1987, Screwball)

programme.title: Romeo and Juliet, (2013, Romance)
programme.desc: Adapted by Julian Fellowes (Downtown Abbey) from the play by William Shakespeare.

programme.title: Elvis And Annabelle, (2008, Drama)

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)

programme.title: Serendipity, (2001, Romance)

programme.title: Just Go With It, (2011, Comedy)

programme.title: Twilight, (2008, Romance)

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse, (2010, Romance)

programme.title: Wild Things, (1998, Thriller)

programme.title: Changing Lanes, (2002, Thriller)

programme.title: Panic Room, (2002, Thriller)

programme.title: Hotel Artemis, (2018, Thriller)

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)

programme.title: The People vs. Larry Flynt, (1996, Independent Drama)

programme.title: The Boxtrolls, (2014, Fantasy)

programme.title: Grown Ups 2, (2013, Screwball)

programme.title: Jack and Jill, (2011, Screwball)
programme.desc: Jack Sadelstein (Adam Sandler) is successful and has the perfect family, but he dreads one event each year: the annual visit of his twin sister Jill (also Adam Sandler). Things spin out of control when Jill decides to extend her visit, permanently!

programme.title: Mommie Dearest, (1981, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: The public Crawford was strong-willed, glamorous and admirable, but Mommie Dearest reveals the private Crawford, the woman desperate to be a mother, adopting her children when she was single and trying to survive in the devastating movie industry.

programme.title: Troll, (1986, Horror)
programme.desc: When an evil troll named Torok attempts to bring about cataclysmic changes that will forever erase mankind, an ancient sorceress and a young boy join forces to stop him before he can carry out his diabolical plan.

programme.title: Cherry 2000, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: What used to be the American Southwest. In this post-MAD MAX Adventureture, a woman mercenary is hired to bust into a 21st-century robot Warehouse which is operated by psychos.

programme.title: Bio-Dome, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this outrageous Comedy, five brave scientists are forced to face life forms more perplexing, more terrifying, more annoying than anything they've ever encountered: Pauly Shore and Stephen Baldwin.

programme.title: Saved!, (2004, Independent Drama)

programme.title: I'm Not There, (2007, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: The life of Bob Dylan is examined through multiple variations of his own personality and career, as played by a series of different actors.

programme.title: How It Ends, (2021, Dramedy)
programme.desc: In this feel-good apocalyptic comedy, Liza (Zoe Lister-Jones) embarks on a hilarious journey through LA in hopes of making it to her last party before it all ends, running into an eclectic cast of characters along the way.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married, (2008, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III, (1982, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Ignoring Camp Crystal Lakes bloody legacy, one by one they fall victim to the maniacal Jason who stalks them at every turn...

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part - IV: The Final Chapter, (1984, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: After his revival in a hospital morgue, the hockey-masked murderer fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning, (1985, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: This time he seems to have set his sights on the young patients at a secluded halfway house. And more than a few of his teen targets end up in half, in quarters... you name it, Jason does it.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part VI: Jason Lives, (1986, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: As a child, Tommy Jarvis did what many others died trying to do. He killed Jason Vorhees, the mass murderer who terrorized the residents of Crystal Lake. But now, years later, Tommy is tormented by the fear that maybe Jason isnt really dead.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp, (1983, Horror)

programme.title: The Evil Dead, (1983, Horror)

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: When a young Amish woman and her son get caught up in the murder of an undercover narcotic's agent, their saviour turns out to be hardened Philadelphia detective John Book.

programme.title: Scrooged, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Frank Cross is a mean TV executive with perfect qualities of a modern-day Scrooge. Before the night is over, he'll be visited by three ghosts from the past, present and future.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Scrooged, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Frank Cross is a mean TV executive with perfect qualities of a modern-day Scrooge. Before the night is over, he'll be visited by three ghosts from the past, present and future.

programme.title: Young Guns, (1988, Action)

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Big Top Pee-Wee, (1987, Screwball)

programme.title: Clue, (1985, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Meet all the notorious suspects and discover all their foul play things. You'll love their dastardly doings as the bodies and the laughs pile up before your eyes. Featuring all three surprise endings!!

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for thrills in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indy and his ex-flame Marion Ravenwood dodge booby-traps, fight Nazis, and stare down snakes in their incredible worldwide quest for the mystical Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, (1984, Action)
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: Lee hesitates when Tsunade asks him whether he will quit pursuing the path of a ninja or choose to undergo a risky surgery with only a fifty percent chance of success.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After being advised by Tsunade to quit the path of the shinobi, Lee recalls his first meeting with his teacher Guy.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his two squadmates have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his whole face.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura are to protect the runners in a race being held during the Todoroki Shrine's ceremonial ritual held every four years.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The chief retainers think that Idate has made a farce of their great traditional festival. Jirocho believes that Idate has fled with some plan in mind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Despite interference from Aoi, Idate continues his run. Idate still trusts no one, and its revealed that during the Chunin Exams, Idates older brother was the proctor who posed the tenth question.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Boss Jirocho waits, confident that Idate will win. But Aoi, the ninja sent by the Wagarashi clan, stands in the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is promoted to chunin, and he and his squadmates celebrate at a BBQ restaurant. In the hospital, Lee decides to undergo a dangerous surgery to repair his body so that he can remain a ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, and just in time, Kakashi arrives to stop the fight.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four, Kidomaru, Sakon, Jirobo and Tayuya, suddenly appear before Sasuke. Sakura is concerned about the Curse Mark placed on Sasuke by Orochimaru
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sakuras pleas fall on deaf ears, and Sasuke leaves Hidden Leaf Village. When Tsunade learns of this, she summons Shikamaru to lead his first mission as a chunin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four race toward Orochimarus lair with Sasuke in hand. Theyre discovered and challenged by the jonin Genma and Raido
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are trapped in Jirobos Earth Dome Prison. They try to pound their way out, but the walls regenerate each time.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After they are freed from the Earth Dome Prison, Shikamaru and the others take off after the remaining Sound while Choji stays behind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After Choji takes the yellow pill it looks as if he may win the battle, until Jirobo transforms into Second State, giving him immense power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Assuming that the Leaf squad could never get past Jirobo, the remaining Sound ninja dont bother to lay traps along the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Neji takes on Kidomaru while the others continue their pursuit of Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kidomaru changes tactics and creates a bow and arrow to attack Nejis blind spot.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Shikamaru, Kiba and Akamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke and the Sound ninja. Naruto and Kiba are upset that they have been unable to catch up and decide to try a surprise attack at night.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru sets explosives in the trees to trap Sakon. But an incensed Sakon turns the tables, and the explosives end up sending Kiba, Akamaru and Sakon off a cliff.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is determined to stop Tayuya, but she uses her Summoning Jutsu to call forth three giants. Meanwhile, on the plains, the battle between Kimimaro and Naruto is about to begin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Ukon, who is able to infiltrate the bodies of others, enters Kibas body and tries to merge with his cells.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: An injured Kiba and Akamaru barely escape from Sakon and Ukon. Naruto is locked in battle with Kimimaro
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru succeeds in trapping Tayuya with his Shadow Possession Jutsu. But Tayuya moves to her Second State and fights back with enormous strength.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With Rock Lee there to take on Kimimaro, Naruto is free to chase after Sasuke, who has awakened.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru, Kiba and Lee are at the limits of their strength when Gaara, Temari and Kankuro appear to assist their Leaf allies.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kimimaro realizes that close combat is impossible against Gaaras wall of sand, so he moves further away for a long-distance attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kimimaro succeeds in shattering Gaaras protective sand shield and attacks Gaara. Naruto finally catches up to Sasuke
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With the Curse Mark covering half his body, Sasuke is no longer the Sasuke of old. Naruto charges at this new Sasuke who has turned his back on his closest comrades.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto tries desperately to change Sasukes mind, but Sasuke is determined to go to Orochimaru. He tells Naruto that in order to surpass his brother, Itachi, power and hatred are necessary.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is brought down by Sasukes Fire Style: Fireball Jutsu. It is a jutsu passed down through generations of the Uchiha family
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sasuke quietly watches as Naruto sinks deeper in the water. He recalls the past when the Uchiha clan was cruelly slaughtered.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: Better Days, (2019, Foreign Drama)
programme.desc: In this dramatic thriller, Nian is faced by relentless bullying from her peers as she prepares for her entrance exam. Fate brings her together with Bei, and then both are dragged into the middle of a murder investigation.

programme.title: Awakenings, (1990, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Robert De Niro and Robin Williams star in a story of the consequences of a maverick doctor's medical miracle. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: The People vs. Larry Flynt, (1996, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Two-time Oscar winner Milos Forman directs Woody Harrelson and Courtney Love in this acclaimed film about "Hustler" publisher Larry Flynt. Rating: R

programme.title: Passengers, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: While helping a handful of plane crash survivors cope with their grief, young psychologist Claire Summers (2008 Best Actress, Oscar nominee Anne Hathaway, Rachel Getting Married) begins to uncover conflicting accounts of the accident. rated -PG-13

programme.title: Go, (1999, Screwball)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: Double Team, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: Vertical Limit, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An emotionally-charged action-adventure tale of a retired climber (O'Donnell) who must launch a treacherous and extraordinary rescue effort up K2, the world's second-highest peak, to save his estranged sister and her summit team in a race against time.

programme.title: The Remains of the Day, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: Oscar-winners Anthony Hopkins (The Silence of the Lambs) and Emma Thompson (Howards End) reunite with the acclaimed Merchant Ivory filmmaking team for this extraordinary and moving story of blind devotion and repressed love. Rated PG

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted, (1999, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder and Academy Award(r)-winner Angelina Jolie are the certifiable stars of Claymoore Hospital's South Bell ward in this wry adaptation of Susanna Kaysen's best-selling memoir.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men, (1993, Screwball)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau portray lifelong feuding neighbors making each day a hilarious game of revenge. But then voluptuous Ariel moves in nearby and their dormant hormones reignite in an all-out competition to win her favor.

programme.title: Grumpier Old Men, (1995, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this sequel to Grumpy Old Men, a vivacious Italian beauty attempts to convert Wabasha, Minnesota's cherished bait store into a romantic Italian restaurant.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men, (1993, Screwball)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau portray lifelong feuding neighbors making each day a hilarious game of revenge. But then voluptuous Ariel moves in nearby and their dormant hormones reignite in an all-out competition to win her favor.

programme.title: Grumpier Old Men, (1995, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this sequel to Grumpy Old Men, a vivacious Italian beauty attempts to convert Wabasha, Minnesota's cherished bait store into a romantic Italian restaurant.

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: The FBI sends a loner (Charles Bronson) to kidnap a mobster's mistress in Switzerland.

programme.title: Brannigan, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: Lenny, (1974, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman magnificently captures the complexities and contradictions of the legendary comedian Lenny Bruce's mercurial character.

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy, (1969, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: This Academy Award-winning Best Picture stars Dustin Hoffman and Jon Voight in standout, Oscar-nominated performances as a con man and a Texas hustler trying to survive on the tough streets of New York. The legendary John Schlesinger directs.

programme.title: The Long Goodbye, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Under the inimitable direction of Robert Altman, Elliot Gould stars as the laid-back, legendary private eye Philip Marlowe investigating a mysterious murder. Also stars Sterling Hayden and Nina Van Pallandt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi calls on the legendary strength of Timaeus, but when it's not enough to crack Rafael's defense, will Yugi resort to desperate measures and go against everything he believes in to make the riskiest move of his life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi's soul! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz's new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Nothing will stop Weevil and Rex Raptor from quenching their thirst for revenge by capturing Yugi and Joey's souls!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Weevil's insect invasion. Discouraged and confused, Yugi has lost his dueling instincts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is on a vision quest where he must travel through a past of evil to find and conquer his greatest foe... himself.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn't care! Dartz sends out his ancient annihilator Orichalcos Soldier to finish Yugi once and for all.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Joey from his friends for a final showdown with Mai's heart on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Valon's battle rages to its climax as Joey attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the same armor that Valon used against him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Joey can barely stand up, much less duel. However, he faces a fresh and determined Mai.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a rematch between the Pharaoh and Rafael - but this time, the Pharaoh doesn't have Yugi to protect him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael appears to be creating an opening for the Pharaoh's counterattack, but Rafael has even more dreadful displays of terror in mind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz summons the thundering Orichalcos Shunoros to pound the Pharaoh and Kaiba into pancakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos! Will his friends reach out from the beyond to give him one last fighting chance?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan's thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide! How can Yugi stop the annihilation of the planet?
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Princess Mansherry's amazing power - to heal living beings completely - is in the hands of the Donquixote executive. If she is able to heal all the executives who've gone down in battle - the Straw Hats and their allies stand no chance!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Seor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both of them are pushed to their limits, we learn Seor's tragic past! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry's rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Manly Duel! Seor's Elegy of Love!

programme.title: Franky and Seor Pink end their harrowing duel in a manly way - but victory knocks the wind out of even the winner's sails! Meanwhile, Diamante and Kyros struggle desperately on the Sunflower Field, each demonstrating their extreme prowess.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Stardust of Death! Diamante's Storm of Vicious Attacks!

programme.title: Kyros, unbowed by Diamante's vicious attacks, fights back with the anger and retribution of all of Dressrosa in order to fulfill his promise to protect Rebecca. If he is successful, only a few executives will remain.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Pica loses his temper and turns his full wrath against King Riku, whom he hopes to destroy, ending the revolution against Doflamingo. Meanwhile, Zoro, who has been distracted by Pica and drawn far from the battle, has to hatch a plan to save the king!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Moving Across the Ground! The Giant Statue Pica's Surprise Maneuver!

programme.title: With the lives of King Riku, Usopp, and the others on the old King's Plateau in the balance, Zoro must dig deep and discover a powerful technique to counter Pica's near-unstoppable onslaught. Meanwhile, King Riku ponders what it means to be a good king.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle in Midair! Zoro's New Special Secret Technique Blasts!

programme.title: Zoro finishes off Pica, and those below his crumbling body rush to find shelter. Meanwhile, the Tontattas finish up demolishing the SMILE Factory, and Luffy's hand is forced in his duel with Bellamy!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Taking down Bellamy only enrages Luffy in his fight against Doflamingo, his anger multiplying when he finds Law's lifeless body! Meanwhile, Doflamingo takes the next step to end the game he started, which will endanger everybody in Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Birdcage draws tighter and tighter around Dressrosa, threatening to destroy all life on the island kingdom! Meanwhile, Doflamingo stands down Luffy for a final confrontation, but a surprising twist shocks everyone on the top of the Royal Palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blade of Tenacity! The Gamma Knife Counterattack!

programme.title: Law's attack proves powerful - but Doflamingo's power has depths which he and Luffy haven't bargained for. When Doflamingo makes his counterattack, Luffy stares him down with an amazing power.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Collision of Haki! Luffy vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Trebol's wrath is fully inflamed as Law summons enough energy to speak, denouncing the Doflamingo Family executives as pawns in Doflamingo's game. But Law gathers enough energy to do more than just speak out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unassailable! The Stunning Secret of Trebol!

programme.title: Cavendish has to make a difficult decision when the severely wounded Law begs him to be left behind. Meanwhile, seeing even his Second Gear or Third Gear attacks aren't working against Doflamingo, Luffy decides to use his ultimate technique!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Erupts! I Will Take Everything upon Myself!

programme.title: Luffy and Doflamingo duke it out while the Birdcage tightens its grip on Dressrosa! Zoro sets off with a plan to stop it from slicing apart the country, while Luffy's Fourth Gear proves quite potent against Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Birdcage continues its merciless constriction, sending the residents of Dressrosa fleeing towards the center of the island, while King Riku calls out to his people: Survive long enough for Luffy to vanquish the last of the royal family.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Fourth Gear gives Luffy the power he needs to head off Doflamingo at every strike! But the energy required to keep Fourth Gear going starts to take a toll on Luffy. Will he have enough left to finish the job?
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Bounce-man's power has drained Luffy, leaving him in need of a rest before he can reuse his Haki, but luckily the gladiators from the Colosseum have come around and are focusing on taking down Doflamingo! Sabo steps in at a crucial moment.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Flame Dragon King! Protect Luffy's Life!

programme.title: With Luffy and so many of the Straw Hats' allies incapacitated, victory seems inevitable for Doflamingo - but the compassion of Mansherry may be enough to turn the tide and renew their hope - to stop the Birdcage!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: With just over a minute to spare, everyone in Dressrosa turns their efforts towards slowing down the Birdcage as it squeezes the life out of the country! Meanwhile, Viola seeks Doflamingo out herself, for a shocking confrontation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: As Long as We Breathe! Stop the Deadly Birdcage!

programme.title: Only a bit more time remains before Luffy returns to the scene! But as time slips by, those who had been roused by Princess Mansherry's powers begin to falter! Meanwhile, Rebecca, under the control of Doflamingo, is about to attack Viola!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dead or Alive! A Fateful Countdown!

programme.title: Luffy regains enough Haki to face off against Doflamingo, but his health is still poor. With the Birdcage closing in, is there a technique left in his repertoire that is strong enough to take down Doflamingo?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Attack on a Celestial! Luffy's King Kong Gun of Anger!

programme.title: With Doflamingo thoroughly quashed and the Birdcage collapsing, the people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy remembering the hardships they've endured, and the actions taken by Luffy and the others to free them.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Jesus Burgess of the Blackbeard Pirates tries to agitate Sabo, mocking Ace's final words in order to unsettle him enough that he can try to steal the Flare-Flare Fruit! Meanwhile, people of Dressrosa beg King Riku to resume the crown.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unheard-of! Admiral Fujitoras Surprising Decision!

programme.title: Repercussions of Doflamingo's defeat reverberate around the world! Fujitora's actions put the Navy in a tight spot, and the "Worst Generation" beings to stir into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sending a Shock Wave! The Worst Generation Goes Into Action!

programme.title: The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of the Legend! The Adventures of the Revolutionary Warrior Sabo!

programme.title: Sabo recounts his surprising reunion with Luffy at the Colosseum as the Straw Hats and the others continue to recoup. Meanwhile, Fujitora gambles on how to make his next move - and the odds are in Luffy's favor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Brothers' Bond! The Untold Story Behind Luffy and Sabo's Reunion!

programme.title: As Sabo departs, our attention shifts to the other Straw Hats waging a fierce battle on a mysterious island. And a new drama is set into motion as ill portents fall from the sky!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Creature! One of the Four Emperors - Kaido, King of the Beasts!

programme.title: As Luffy and the others begin to come to their senses, major players in the Navy arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats! Also, Rebecca's history is whitewashed with a fake cover story - but why?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fujitora Takes Action! The Complete Siege of the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Fujitora's flirting with chance has turned out poorly for the Straw Hats as the full Navy force bears down on Dressrosa searching for the pirates! Luffy and the others make a mad dash for the east port to get off the island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A State of Emergency! Rebecca Is Kidnapped!

programme.title: Rebecca has precious little time to follow Luffy's lead and make it to Kyros. Can she make it in time? Meanwhile, Fujitora is closing in on Bartolomeo and the other Colosseum warriors while Trafalgar Law faces the shadows of his past!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Bond Between Father and Daughter! Kyros and Rebecca!

programme.title: Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazon, and the secret of Trafalgar Law's name. Meanwhile, Fujitora uses the destruction caused by the battle in Dressrosa as a weapon, and squares off one-on-one with Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Men's Pride! Luffy vs. Fujitora, Head-to-Head!

programme.title: The people of Dressrosa show their appreciation to the Straw Hats one last time by foiling Fujitora's strategy. As Luffy and the others are able to finally make their break from the island, however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Way Out! Admiral Fujitora's Ruthless Pursuit!

programme.title: With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sons' Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet is Formed!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are underway, Doflamingo has serious predictions for the upset of the world order! Meanwhile, the recent actions in Dressrosa have led to surprising results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsne Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsne Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsne Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Hes a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. Hes Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Hes a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. Hes Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Moon, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Hes a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. Hes Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.desc: Gene heads South in a fiesta of melody and a jamboree of romance. He fights for the right of rancheros to live on their rancho. Outlaws fear him and senoritas cheer him, and his famous horse Champion.

programme.desc: In 1878, Gene Autry is a cattle buyer who tries to settle a battle between the cattlemen and homesteaders, when the latter are worked up into a feverish pitch by unscrupulous landowner Steve Rutledge.

programme.title: Buffalo Girls, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Based on Larry McMurtry's best-selling novel which celebrates the bold escapades of Calamity Jane and her illustrious cohorts, as they travel the wild west in search of her long-lost daughter and the west they once knew.

programme.title: Buffalo Girls, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Based on Larry McMurtry's best-selling novel which celebrates the bold escapades of Calamity Jane and her illustrious cohorts, as they travel the wild west in search of her long-lost daughter and the west they once knew.

programme.title: Oklahoma!, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Drama)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the armyand each other!

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Drama)

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seeing the happy couples around her, Minako starts questioning her life as a Sailor Guardian and the sacrifices she has to make.
programme.sub-title: I Want to Quit Being a Sailor Guardian: Minako's Dilemma

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite is confident that she has finally found a person possessing the talisman. Aided by a Daimon, Kaolinate goes after her next target: Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Usagi in Tears: A Glass Slipper for My Birthday

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taking Tuxedo Mask as a hostage, Kaolinite tells Usagi and the Sailor Guardians to come to the top of Tokyo Tower for their final showdown.
programme.sub-title: The Stolen Pure Heart: Usagi's Crisis

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Following Kaolinites death, Eudial takes over and begins searching for the talismans. Her first target is Maya, a world-renowned Taiko drummer.
programme.sub-title: The Arrival of a Small Pretty Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa has returned from the future to complete her training as a Sailor Guardian. She is to learn how to make friends in the twentieth century.
programme.sub-title: Making New Friends: Chibi Moon's Adventure

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: After experiencing a humiliating defeat by a Daimon, Makoto decides to retrain herself in the mountains.
programme.sub-title: I Want Power: Mako Lost in Doubt

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls are taking a tour at one of the high schools they plan to apply to next year.
programme.sub-title: The Bond of Destiny: Uranus's Distant Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa is stunned at the sight of Usagi and the others enjoying a pie since she actually made the pie for Masanori, the boy she has a crush on.
programme.sub-title: Art Is an Explosion of Love: Chibi-Usa's First Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru and the girls receive an invitation to a party hosted by Edwards, an Englishman who lives alone on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako realizes that she is the only Sailor Guardian who has not been targeted by a Daimon.
programme.sub-title: The Shocking Moment: Everyone's Identities Revealed

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Michiru and Haruka sense that soon they will find the talismans.
programme.sub-title: The Death of Uranus and Neptune: The Talisman Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and Neptune are revealed to be the ones possessing the talismans. The Sailor Guardians go after Eudial, who is on the run with their talismans.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is very intrigued when she hears Chibi-Usa is going to a 'friends' house to play.
programme.sub-title: A House Filled with Evil Presence: The Beautiful Hotaru's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako and Mimete enter a movie audition where the winner gets to costar with the idol Jinta Araki. Both girls are eager to win the role.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Three Guardians of the Outer Solar System sense something dangerous lurking inside Hotaru Tomoe's personality.
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Silence: The Pale Glimmer of a Firefly

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotaru tries to avoid Chibi-Usa out of fear that her other personality will bring harm. Undaunted, Chibi-Usa invites Hotaru to go on a picnic.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shun Hayase is a high school athlete who sets a new national record in the men's high jump after overcoming health issues as a child.

programme.desc: Usagi and her friends visit a new planetarium, which has opened in the Juban District. Mimete attacks with Daimon u Choten.

programme.desc: Usagi and the others sneak into the practice examination site of the Mugen Academy. They meet Yui Bido who takes an interest in Ami's intelligence.

programme.desc: Tigers Eye approaches Naru in a plot to capture Pegasus in a subspace cage invented by Hawks Eye.

programme.title: Escape Plan, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: An expert (Sylvester Stallone) in prison security joins forces with an inmate (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to break out of a top-secret, high-tech facility.

programme.title: Escape Plan 2: Hades, (1970, Entertainment)
